StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetQSNChangeRequest]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ChangeRequestID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT qsn.QSNChangeRequestID, qsn.QSNID, qsn.QSNChangeRequestStatusID, qsn.RUCReserveUnitID, qsn.MOSID, qsn.RANKID, qsn.Remarks, recr.QSNChangeRequestReviewId as RecReviewId, recr.ReviewerID as RecReviewerId, recr.ReviewDate as RecReviewDate, recr.ReviewAc.onID as RecAc.onId, rssr.QSNChangeRequestReviewId as RssReviewId, rssr.ReviewerID as RssReviewerId, rssr.ReviewDate as RssReviewDate, rssr.ReviewAc.onID as RssAc.onId, rsr.QSNChangeRequestReviewId as RsReviewId, rsr.ReviewerID as RsReviewerId, rsr.ReviewDate as RsReviewDate, rsr.ReviewAc.onID as RsAc.onId, mcrcr.QSNChangeRequestReviewId as McrcReviewId, mcrcr.ReviewerID as McrcReviewerId, mcrcr.ReviewDate as McrcReviewDate, mcrcr.ReviewAc.onID as McrcAc.onId, qsn.RequestedBy_UserID, qsn.RequestDate FROM [dbo].[QSNChangeRequest] qsn LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[QSNChangeRequestReview] recr on recr.QSNChangeRequestReviewId = qsn.RecruiterReviewID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[QSNChangeRequestReview] rssr on rssr.QSNChangeRequestReviewId = qsn.SNCOICReviewID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[QSNChangeRequestReview] rsr on rsr.QSNChangeRequestReviewId = qsn.RsReviewID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[QSNChangeRequestReview] mcrcr on mcrcr.QSNChangeRequestReviewId = qsn.McrcReviewID WHERE QSNChangeRequestID = @ChangeRequestID
